Description:
I/21032022/NJM/01 - You have failed to make and give effect to such arrangements as are appropriate for the effective, planning, 
organisation, control, monitoring and review of preventative and protective measures to control the risks to 
your employeesâ€™ health and safety associated with working with water-mix metal working fluids as you have 
not implemented appropriate arrangements for the routine monitoring of pH and concentration levels.

I/21032022/NJM/02 - You informed me that you have not ensured that employees exposed to water mix metal-working fluids, a 
substance which is hazardous to health and has the potential to cause work-related skin disorders such as 
dermatitis, are under suitable health surveillance
